analyzed: saṃdṛśya gambhīram udāram abdhi ākāśa upamam sūtra su mātṛkām ca
śrīmat guroḥ āsya samudgata arthān duṣprāpaṇīyān vilikhāmi ca aham

original: atra bodhisattvānāṃ ratnopamāḥ pañcāśad dharmāḥ prāṇopamādayaḥ /
analyzed: atra bodhisattvānām ratna upamāḥ pañcāśat dharmāḥ prāṇa upama ādayaḥ
āyuḥ jīvitam ādhāraḥ ūṣma vijñānayoḥ hi yaḥ
yathā sattvāḥ prāṇeṣu snihyantaḥ prāṇān ca āśrayante
tathā bodhisattvāḥ api prāṇa upama bodhi citte snihyantaḥ tat āśrayante
mātā pitṛ samaḥ dharmaḥ tu śūnyatā karuṇe
tad anā utpāde na bodhisattva sambhavaḥ
gṛhiṇī vat mṛti śikṣā karmaṇi saṃciti saṃjñāni ahorātram tris samāgamaḥ
tu gṛham eva durgati dvāra pidhānāt
mitra vat tri dhātu prayogam kurvan api nirvāṇa āśaya tā
vipula dāne pi vipāka nirapekṣa tā
sarva dharma anutpāda jñāne pi karma vipāka anutsargaḥ
sarva dharma nairātmya jñāne sattveṣu karuṇā utpādaḥ
upādhyāya upamāḥ tu ārya kāśyapaparipṛcchā sūtre bodhi citta avismaraṇāya catvāraḥ dharmāḥ
śreṣṭhi samāḥ śikṣā samuccaye caturdaśa apakāra pratipakṣāḥ
prajā upamaḥ tu śva dāsa cāṇḍāla vat ahaṅkāra nāśaḥ
netra upame tu āśaya adhyāśaya viśuddhī
toya saṃkāra upamā tri maṇḍala pariśuddhiḥ
mārga darśaka samāḥ smṛti samprajanya yoni śomanasikāra apramādāḥ
vyādhi pīḍā upamam tu ādhyātmika bāhya vastu abhiniviṣṭa cittam

original: hatacittapuruṣavat gṛhastho bodhisattva evaṃ vicārayati- kadāhaṃ brahmacārī bhaveyam /
analyzed: hata citta puruṣa vat gṛhasthaḥ bodhisattvaḥ evam vicārayati kadā aham brahmacārī bhaveyam

original: pravrajita evaṃ cintayati- kadāhaṃ jagato duḥkhāni moktuṃ kṣama iti /
analyzed: pravrajitaḥ evam cintayati kadā aham jagataḥ duḥkhāni moktum kṣamaḥ iti
kusīda upamam gṛhasthena kṣetra ādīnām a parityāgaḥ
pravrajitena hasti yuddha darśanam api mithyājīvaḥ iti uktam
mūka upamaḥ para doṣa bhrānti anākhyātā
gṛhīta caura upamaḥ saddharma vināśe saddharma grāhakaḥ
dūta upamaḥ tu bodhisattvaḥ bahu arthaḥ bahu kriyaḥ udāra cittaḥ ca
śiṣya upamaḥ tu tris divā tris ca rātrau guru paryupāsakaḥ
kṛta puṇya sambhāra sañcayaḥ saṃvara poṣakaḥ ca
pratyutthāpaka upamaḥ sarva sattva buddhatva prāpaṇa pūrvam sva buddhatva kāmaḥ
prathama kalpa manuṣya upamaḥ ācaraṇa śīla jīvikā vidhi dṛṣṭi sampannaḥ
sa kāma puruṣa upamaḥ samasta caryāpatha para artha pariṇāmanaḥ
andhakāra upamaḥ mahā madhyamaka artha nitya vāsaḥ
unmatta upamaḥ kārya akārya anabhijña tā
māra abhibhūta upamaḥ pañcapañcāśat dvātriṃśat āntarāyika dharmā āmabhijña tā
ārya bodhisattva piṭake tat yathā āntarāyikaḥ ekaḥ dharmaḥ pramādaḥ
pañca prāṇa atipātaḥ datta ādānam kāma mithyā ācāraḥ mṛṣāvādaḥ madya pānam ca
ṣaṣ buddha dharma saṃgha śīla ācārya jyeṣṭha anādaraḥ
dvātriṃśat āntarāyikāḥ dharmāḥ api ārya mahāyāna upadeśa sūtre tat yathā putri

original: tairāntarāyikaiḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śīghraṃ na niryāṇaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: taiḥ āntarāyikaiḥ sarvajña tāyām śīghram na niryāṇam bhavati
tat yathā śrāvaka pratyekabuddha yāna kāmitā
kāya vāc citta karma a pariśuddhiḥ
bodhya pariṇāmanā iti tri skandha vipakṣa tā

original: 'putri/ dvātriṃśad ime mahāyānasya āntarāyikāḥ samyak vyapadiṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: putri dvātriṃśad ime mahāyānasya āntarāyikāḥ samyak vyapadiṣṭāḥ

original: yāvanto hi mahāyānaguṇā antarāyā api tāvantastāvad ityuktam /
analyzed: yāvantaḥ hi mahāyāna guṇāḥ antarāyāḥ api tāvantaḥ tāvat iti uktam

original: api ca, aprameyā antarāyadharmā bahuṣu sūtreṣu dṛśyante,
analyzed: api ca aprameyāḥ antarāya dharmāḥ bahuṣu sūtreṣu dṛśyante
kintu atra grantha gauravāt na nirupyante
etat mārga sthīkṛta ādi karmika bodhisattvaiḥ tad tad sūtreṣu draṣṭavyam

original: aparāṇyapi sāṃkathyāni bahūni vartante-sughoraparuṣaṃ suduḥsahaṃ dukhaṃ ciraṃ sahyata idamapi mahadāścaryam /
analyzed: aparāṇi api sāṃkathyāni bahūni vartante su ghora paruṣam su duḥsaham dukham ciram sahyate idam api mahat āścaryam
catur ogha vikṣiptam paunaḥpunyena kaṅkālayāna ārohaṇam tat api mahat āścaryam

original: bhāryā gṛhaṃ ca prahāya suvratādāne 'pi sadā kāyavāṅmanovikṣepa idamapi mahadāścaryam /
analyzed: bhāryāḥ gṛham ca prahāya suvratā dāne sadā kāya vāc manaḥ vikṣepe idam api mahat āścaryam

original: svalpamātrasyāpi kuśalamūlasya abhāve 'pi tasyaivārthato buddhajñānagaveṣaṇam idamapi
analyzed: su alpa mātrasya api kuśala mūlasya abhāve pi tasya eva arthataḥ buddha jñāna gaveṣaṇam idam api
mahat āścaryam pratimokṣa śikṣā abhāve mahāyāna śreṣṭha bodhi dvaya gaveṣaṇam idam api mahat āścaryam
ityādiṣu mahā āścaryeṣu bahuṣu api satsu
jambūdvīpa puruṣasya vikalpa ācārāḥ katham vaktum śakyante

original: tasmād bhavanto muktikāmā vidvāṃsastairunmattaiḥ saha akṛtasaṃsargā apramattās tiṣṭhantu /
analyzed: tasmāt bhavantaḥ mukti kāmāḥ vidvāṃsaḥ taiḥ unmattaiḥ saha a kṛta saṃsargāḥ apramattāḥ tiṣṭhantu

original: evaṃ te karuṇāviṣayatvavyatiriktāḥ uttamamārgavyapadeśe 'pi tatra na praviśanti,
analyzed: evam te karuṇā viṣaya tva vyatiriktāḥ uttama mārga vyapadeśe tatra na praviśanti

original: yāvad abhijñatā na prāpyate tāvad anyeṣāṃ vipākāsaṃbhavāt khaḍgavat sthātavyam /
analyzed: yāvat abhijña tā na prāpyate tāvat anyeṣām vipāka asaṃbhavāt khaḍga vat sthātavyam
sūtrasamuccaya upadeśaḥ mahā vidvat ācārya dīpaṅkara śrī jñāna viracitaḥ samāptaḥ

original: tenaiva bhāratīyamahopādhyāyena mahāsaṃśodhakalokacakṣuṣā jayaśīlena (chul khrimas rgyal va)
analyzed: tena eva bhāratīya mahā upādhyāyena mahā saṃśodhaka loka cakṣuṣā jaya śīlena
